summary: DOD plans to acquire nearly 2,500 F-35 aircraft for about $400 billion. It projects spending another $1.27 trillion to operate and sustain them—an estimate that has steadily increased since 2012. We testified that the military services collectively face tens of billions of dollars in sustainment costs that they project will be unaffordable. title: F-35 Sustainment: Enhanced Attention to and Oversight of F-35 Affordability Are Needed
